messages.content:
According to the provided documentation, besides standard tools, the following tools are required in order to perform the necessary care and maintenance of the mixer:

1. Torque wrench 0-137 Nm (0-101 ft lb) - Part No. 84 15 66
2. Torque wrench 50-225 Nm(37-166 ft lb) - Part No. 84 15 64

For further information on tools, see Flygt's Tool Catalogue.

Additionally, a universal instrument (VOM), a test lamp (continuity tester), and a wiring diagram are required for fault tracing on the electrical equipment.
